Our latest work on human immune variation in influenza vaccination response is now out at MedRxiv. In it we define the concept of a "naturally adjuvanted" immune setpoint in humans. Check out my thread about **Multiscale integration of human and single-cell variations reveals unadjuvanted vaccine high responders are naturally adjuvanted** on twitter to learn more. https://twitter.com/MPMule/status/1639988299048660992
